resources.string: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?
This project was made for the Android Development Course using Kotlin

The user will have to log into the app using his Google account.

After he successfully logs in he can choose a category from a list.

Upon choosing his desired category, the game will start and he will have to answer 9 questions (3 easy, 3 medium and 3 hard ones).

If he answers wrong or if he correctly answers all 9 questions the game will end and he can share his result through various platforms.
